title: Grindstone
desc:
Post 851
- When stood on, you may remove any <:enchantment:1107516323426213888> or any **Enhancements** from any card in your hand.
- This card is of the Stone subtype.
- This card takes 2 hits to break with a tool that is not meant for it.
- This card cannot be drawn, and instead replaces an 788 if it is placed next to a 786.
